name: Delivery Mayhem
description:
This game requires you to pick up boxes and throw them into containers.

Make sure you throw the boxes into the "Correct" container. 

Correct meaning the color matches.

Fill a container up and it goes away and clears up a spot.

Important that you don't let the containers overflow the railway, or else...

"WASD "
To move around

"Spacebar"

To pick up and throw boxes
